name: daos
servers: []
provider: ""
socket_dir: /var/run/daos_server
access_points:
- localhost
port: 10000
ca_cert: ""
cert: ./.daos/daos_server.crt
key: ./.daos/daos_server.key
fault_path: ""
fault_cb: ""
fabric_ifaces: []
format_override: true
scm_mount_path: /mnt/daos
bdev_include: []
bdev_exclude: []
hyperthreads: false

name: daos
servers: []
provider: ""
socket_dir: /var/run/daos_server
access_points:
- localhost
port: 10000
ca_cert: ""
cert: ./.daos/daos_server.crt
key: ./.daos/daos_server.key
fault_path: ""
fault_cb: ""
fabric_ifaces: []
format_override: true
scm_mount_path: /mnt/daos
bdev_include: []
bdev_exclude: []
hyperthreads: false

name: daos_cust
servers: []
provider: ofi+verbs
socket_dir: /tmp/daos_server
access_points:
- foo1.com:9999
- bar1.com:1111
port: 11111
ca_cert: /tmp/ca.crt
cert: /tmp/serv.crt
key: /tmp/serv.key
fault_path: /foo.com
fault_cb: /tmp/daos_fault_cb.sh
fabric_ifaces:
- ib0
- ib1
format_override: true
scm_mount_path: /tmp/daos
bdev_include:
- pcie1000.0.0.0.8
- pcie1000.0.0.0.9
bdev_exclude:
- pcie1000.0.0.0.7
hyperthreads: true
